creator: pmh_rmhax@hotmail.com
text:
If you setup your system to use an apache server as your proxy on port 80, and 
then visit the URL http://localhost/, you will see 'index of /', (it does not 
work for every server)

E-mail pmh_rmhax@hotmail.com for some servers that are vulnerable if you need 
proof/an example

---Raydiosis---
---Pmh_rmhax@hotmail.com---

Sounds more like a misconfiguration. Do you have a sample configuration of such
a server?
creator: nd@perlig.de
